entry.title: All Campus Cookout Today!
entry.summary: May 8 11:30 a.m. -3 p.m. Today we will be doing an All Campus Cookout in conjunction with P.A.W. in front of the HUB on the Alumni Green. Food, fun, music and activities from 11:30 a.m. till 3 p.m. Both Prospect and the Union Grille will be closed during that time. Meal Plan students can [...]
entry.content:
May 8
11:30 a.m. -3 p.m.

Today we will be doing an All Campus Cookout in conjunction with P.A.W. in front of the HUB on the Alumni Green.
Food, fun, music and activities from 11:30 a.m. till 3 p.m.

Both Prospect and the Union Grille will be closed during that time.

Meal Plan students can swipe and eat for free.
There is a suggested $5 donation for all others with all proceeds being donated to the “Imagine A Way” Scholarship Fund.

We hope you’ll join us.

entry.title: Local Foods
entry.summary: Wednesday dinner (Jan 29) Prospect Dining hall will be serving hand pressed ground beef hamburgers made with local ground beef from PT Farm, Norht Haverhill NH. newenglandmeat.com Enjoy!
entry.content:
Wednesday dinner (Jan 29) Prospect Dining hall will be serving hand pressed ground beef hamburgers made with local ground beef from PT Farm, Norht Haverhill NH.

newenglandmeat.com

Enjoy!

entry.title: Winter Hours of Operation
entry.summary: All dining venues on campus will be closed from Saturday, December 21 through Wednesday, January 1. Union Grille Winterim Hours: 7:30 a.m.-7:30 p.m. Monday-Thursday 7:30 a.m.-4:30 p.m. Friday Closed weekends and Martin Luther King, Jr. Day. Union Grille “Blue Plate Specials” for January 2014 All other venues will remain closed through the start of the [...]
entry.content:
All dining venues on campus will be closed from Saturday, December 21 through Wednesday, January 1.

Union Grille Winterim Hours:
7:30 a.m.-7:30 p.m. Monday-Thursday
7:30 a.m.-4:30 p.m. Friday
Closed weekends and Martin Luther King, Jr. Day.
Union Grille “Blue Plate Specials” for January 2014

All other venues will remain closed through the start of the Spring Semester.

entry.title: Stress Less… Join us for Late Nite
entry.summary: Late Nite Meals will be available from 9:30-11 p.m. on December 16 and Tuesday, December 17 in Prospect Hall.
entry.content: Late Nite Meals will be available from 9:30-11 p.m. on December 16 and Tuesday, December 17 in Prospect Hall.

entry.title: Thanksgiving Break Hours of Operation
entry.summary: Last meal on the meal plan is Tuesday Dinner and first meal back is Sunday dinner! Prospect Hall Closes on Tuesday, November 26 at 7:20 p.m. Re-opens Monday, December 2 at 7:30 a.m. Union Grille Closes on Tuesday, November 26 at 1:30 p.m. Re-opens Sunday, December 1 at 2 p.m.* On the Go Closes on [...]
entry.content:
Last meal on the meal plan is Tuesday Dinner and first meal back is Sunday dinner!

Prospect Hall
Closes on Tuesday, November 26 at 7:20 p.m.
Re-opens Monday, December 2 at 7:30 a.m.

Union Grille
Closes on Tuesday, November 26 at 1:30 p.m.
Re-opens Sunday, December 1 at 2 p.m.*

On the Go
Closes on Tuesday, November 26 at 1:30 p.m.
Re-opens Monday, December 2 at 7:30 a.m.

Sidewalk Cafe
Closes on Tuesday, November 26 at 11 a.m
Re-opens Monday, December 2 at 7:30 a.m.

Commons Café
Closes on Tuesday, November 26 at 11 a.m.
Re-opens Monday, December 2 at 7:30 a.m.

The Woods Café
Closes on Tuesday, November 26 at 10 a.m.
Re-opens Monday, December 2 at 7:30 a.m.

* Meal Vouchers for Sunday Dinner (good at 10 locations from 2 p.m. thru close) can be picked up on Sunday, December 1 starting at 2 p.m. in the Union Grille.

HAPPY THANKSGIVING! To you and your families from the Sodexo team!

entry.title: International Education Week – Global Chef Competition
entry.summary: 11:30 a.m.-2 p.m. Prospect Dining Hall Vote for your favorite Celebrity Student Chef! $11 cash, $8 flexcash, or mealplan.

entry.title: Order Your 2013 Thanksgiving Pies!
entry.summary: Taking orders through Wednesday, November 20, 2013. With the holidays quickly approaching, we would like to remind you that it is now time to order your Thanksgiving pies! Choose from Traditional Pumpkin Pie, Traditional Apple Pie, Cran-Apple Pie, Dutch Apple Pie, Pecan Pie, Chocolate Cream Pie, Traditional Cheesecake, Pumpkin Cheesecake. Pie Tasting will take place [...]
entry.content:
Taking orders through Wednesday, November 20, 2013.

With the holidays quickly approaching, we would like to remind you that it is now time to order your Thanksgiving pies!

Choose from Traditional Pumpkin Pie, Traditional Apple Pie, Cran-Apple Pie, Dutch Apple Pie, Pecan Pie, Chocolate Cream Pie, Traditional Cheesecake, Pumpkin Cheesecake.

Pie Tasting will take place in

  • Union Grille on Tuesday, November 5 and in
  • Prospect Hall on Wednesday, November 6 during lunch.

Order Your Thanksgiving Pies Today! (PDF)

Pies must be prepaid with your order. Phone: 535-2710 Fax: 535-3273

Pies will be ready for pickup at Prospect Hall between 10 a.m.-6 p.m. on Tuesday November 26, 2013.
